tool_description: Constructs comprehensive prior authorization requests with all required clinical and administrative information formatted for insurance submission.

provider_npi.description: National Provider Identifier of requesting provider

diagnosis_codes.description: ICD-10 diagnosis codes supporting medical necessity

clinical_notes.description: Clinical justification for the requested procedures

facility_name.description: Name of facility where service will be provided

error_messages: Missing required clinical information: Ensure all procedure codes, diagnosis codes, and clinical notes are provided.
Invalid urgency level: Use one of [routine, urgent, emergent].
Insufficient clinical justification: Clinical notes must adequately support medical necessity.
Invalid date format: Planned service date must be in ISO 8601 format and in the future.
Provider credentials invalid: Verify the NPI is active and properly formatted.
usage: Provide comprehensive patient, provider, clinical, and administrative information to build a complete authorization request ready for submission.

authorization_request_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated authorization request

request_status.description: Status of request creation: completed, pending_review, failed

submission_ready.description: Whether the request is ready for submission to insurance

required_attachments.description: List of additional documents needed before submission
